import numpy as np
import os

data_dir = ''outputs/data/ch4_trajectories_replan''
faults = [''F1'', ''F2'', ''F3'', ''F4'', ''F5'']
etas = [0.2, 0.5, 0.8]

print(''=== 检查不同eta值下轨迹数据差异 ==='')
for fault in faults[:2]:  # 先检查F1和F2
    print(f''\n--- {fault} ---'')
    trajectories = {}
    for eta in etas:
        fname = f''{fault}_eta{eta}_replan.npz''
        fpath = os.path.join(data_dir, fname)
        if os.path.exists(fpath):
            data = np.load(fpath)
            trajectories[eta] = {
                ''altitude'': data[''altitude''],
                ''downrange'': data[''downrange''],
                ''time'': data[''time''],
                ''mission_domain'': str(data.get(''mission_domain'', ''N/A''))
            }
            print(f''  eta={eta}: 终端高度={data["altitude"][-1]:.2f}km, 终端下航程={data["downrange"][-1]:.2f}km, 域={data.get("mission_domain", "N/A")}'')
        else:
            print(f''  eta={eta}: 文件不存在'')
    
    # 比较不同eta的轨迹差异
    if len(trajectories) >= 2:
        print(f''  轨迹差异:'')
        for i, eta1 in enumerate(etas):
            for eta2 in etas[i+1:]:
                if eta1 in trajectories and eta2 in trajectories:
                    alt_diff = np.max(np.abs(trajectories[eta1][''altitude''] - trajectories[eta2][''altitude'']))
                    dr_diff = np.max(np.abs(trajectories[eta1][''downrange''] - trajectories[eta2][''downrange'']))
                    print(f''    eta={eta1} vs eta={eta2}: 高度最大差={alt_diff:.4f}km, 下航程最大差={dr_diff:.4f}km'')
")
